title: Quake-safety class offered for teachers
author: Unknown
text: TACOMA A free earthquake-safety class for elementary schoolteachers will be offered tomorrow at the Quality Hotel in Tacoma.     The "K-6 Tremor Troop" curriculum, devised by the National Science Teachers Association, enables teachers to help children understand why earthquakes occur and to prepare for them.     To register for the 8:30 a.m. to 4 p.m. program, call the Pierce County Department of Emergency Management at 591-7470. Free lunch will be provided for teachers, who will earn clock-hour credits. The Quality Hotel is at 2611 E. E St. near the Tacoma Dome.
